sentence.Network_cn: 废除该教会的国教制是正确的。

sentence.Network_en: a campaign to disestablish the Church of England
sentence.Network_cn: 废除英格兰圣公会国教地位的运动

一个有着 dynamic extent 的 entity 透过名字来参照时，总是参照到最近一次尚未被释放的 (disestablished) entity。比如：
... “discipline” 应该有“教育”的含义。（属于根据同义词的替代关系猜测词义） 【disestablish 即废除】 - “phobia” 指“恐惧症”。.

entry.tran: 废除(教会或宗教)的国教制
entry.def: To disestablish a church or religion means to take away its official status, so that it is no longer recognized as a national institution.

example.ex: It would be right to disestablish the church.
example.tran: 废除该教会的国教制是正确的。

means.word_mean: 1. deprive (an established church) of its status

auth_sentence.content: Hold referendums for its successions and disestablish the church by all means.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hold referendums for its successions and disestablish the church by all means.
